tag_list: direct-marketing, marketing-automation, multi-channel-marketing, distributed-marketing, local-store-marketing, sales-automation, crm, variable-data-printing, marketing-asset-management, web-to-print, direct-mail, personalized-urls
overview:
Mail Print help companies manage and execute direct marketing more efficiently and effectively using: 1) marketing automation systems 2) database-driven personalization of print and digital marketing pieces

Integrations With CRM, ERP and Database Systems

Mail Print’s marketing automation and production systems use an API to integrate with customer and 3rd-party systems, allowing companies to streamline their marketing and printing processes and improve their ROI. Mail Print’s existing integrations include: - Salesforce.com CRM - ExactTarget - Teradata - Experian - Accudata

Marketing Asset & Print Management

Mail Print’s marketing management portal is used by hundreds of franchises and multi-location companies to streamline marketing creation, versioning and execution for their network of locations. The Marketing Communications Portal solution currently serves more than 14,000 users and locations, protecting their corporate branding standards on the email, direct mail, print, online, mobile and digital marketing assets they use.

Database Marketing Personalization

Mail Print’s Variable Data Printing and personalized marketing technologies use client’s data to produce dynamic marketing communications that include relevant text, imagery and offers for each recipient.

Multi-Channel Marketing Automation

Mail Print’s marketing campaign automation technology empowers companies to send multi-touch campaigns with a stream of communications to individuals or groups of contacts. Campaigns can be initiated in three ways: 1) Through Mail Print’s marketing portal by Marketing or Sales 2) From within a customers’ CRM System by their users 3) Auto-triggered by contact behaviors or database updates.
